content.raw: I see that the docs are inconsistent here. Python 2 docs say the default is unbuffered. Python 3 says to match what would be expected from Python 2, it should be buffered. I don't see any reason why it shouldn't be buffered though I can see the case for keeping it unbuffered. I think the code can stay as-is and this is not a big deal unless @hoffman has anything to add to this.
